summary: Dolphin experts confront the US Navy when its sonar program is suspected of causing the animals' deaths.
cast: Caitlin Wachs|Samantha Jade|George Harris|Paul Wesley|Ivana Milicevic|Leah Eneas|David Keith|Christine Adams|Eva-Jean Sophia Young|Bella King|Christopher Herrod|Michelle Sellers|Officer Michael|Jane Wall|Michael Ironside|John Wesley|Algerita Wynn|Jovanna Hepburn|Greg Lee|Skip Hunt|Tah Kevin Njokom|Mike Lutz|Robin Krasny|Roman Dent|David Pearl|Adam Rizzieri
title: Beneath the Blue
